Text: Add more filters for transaction list
Fix compiler warning for version conflict of ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib
Change Comparator from enum to class with subclass for IntComparator and StringComparator. (Rule::Comparator should return Comparator)
Fix MvbParser bug for first month of each year uses the Year of the old balance. Which is from the previous year. So it gets the year of the year wrong. Timestamp from last balance is a bad choice.
Make ToDo Manager select existing json file
Add saving of rules. Maybe time to move to DB. Using Json.Net is a bitch here.
Check why Rules are not deleted when Catetories are
Bug in parsing. Transactions have references of other transactions.
